<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## AgentRouterOptions.serveSchema property

If set to `true` , router will serve OpenAPI schema JSON on `/` route

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
serveSchema?: boolean;
```
